title: Internet is fine yet it keeps saying try to reconnect.
body: When ever I am logged on and try to find a game it says that I have to reconnect even though my internet is fine. This problem keeps happening even when I am not trying to find a game. I have tried reinstalling and repairing and nothing works.

replies.body: Let's make sure to hit some of the typical culprits first by checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly. There's a chance that something might have been reset accidentally, so let's first make sure everything is still correctly setup for League to run.
It all works fine now Thanks. Your my Nibba{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
